name: ONE_SOURCE
description: Every piece of knowledge has exactly one authoritative representation. Extract on second use.

name: SIMPLEST_WORKS
description: The simplest working solution wins. Complexity multiplies failure modes.

name: ONE_JOB
description: A module, class, or function has one reason to change. Do one thing well.

name: EXTEND_DONT_MODIFY
description: Open for extension, closed for modification. Add behavior without changing existing code.

name: SUBSTITUTABLE
description: Subtypes must be substitutable for their base types. A child class never breaks parent's contract.

name: SMALL_INTERFACES
description: Many specific interfaces beat one general interface. Clients shouldn't depend on methods they don't use.

name: DEPEND_ON_ABSTRACTIONS
description: Depend on abstractions, not concretions. High-level modules don't depend on low-level modules.

name: NO_SURPRISES
description: Systems behave as users expect. Match mental models. Surprising behavior is a bug.

name: COMPOSABLE
description: Components work standalone and combined. Independently testable. Freely composable.

name: FAIL_VISIBLY
description: Errors surface immediately. Never swallow exceptions. Silent failures compound into disasters.

name: DEADLINES
description: External calls have explicit timeouts. Infinity is not a timeout. Hanging is worse than failing.

name: MERGE
description: Combine duplicates into one source. Two representations of the same knowledge become one.

name: FLATTEN
description: Remove unnecessary nesting levels. Deep hierarchies obscure intent and multiply complexity.

name: DEFRAGMENT
description: Move related things adjacent. Scattered code forces readers to reconstruct context.

name: DECOUPLE
description: Hidden dependencies become explicit. Every coupling point is a failure point.

name: HOIST
description: Move invariants out of repetition. Computation inside loops wastes resources and obscures intent.

name: PRUNE
description: Remove dead and unreachable code. Dead code hides bugs and burdens maintenance.

name: COALESCE
description: Merge sequential same-type operations. Five inserts become one bulk. Three API calls become one batch.

name: REFLOW
description: Order by importance, then chronology. Public API at top, helpers at bottom. Constants before methods.

name: LEAVE_BETTER
description: Every change improves the codebase. Fix nearby broken windows. Never degrade.

name: ONE_CHANGE
description: Modify one thing at a time. Commit often. Verify each step.

name: TEST_FIRST
description: Write the failing test before the fix. If you can't test it, you can't prove it.

name: SKELETON_FIRST
description: Build the thinnest working slice first. Skeleton before flesh. Validate the path before optimizing.

name: MEASURE_THEN_OPTIMIZE
description: No optimization without metrics. Measure, don't guess.

name: REVERSIBLE
description: Every action can be undone. Edits, config changes, state mutations need rollback.

name: BE_CONCISE
description: Vigorous writing is concise. No unnecessary words, sentences, or tokens.

name: SELF_EXPLAINING
description: Code is self-explanatory. Comments explain why, not what.

name: VISUAL_HIERARCHY
description: Structure defines importance. Important code is visually prominent.

name: STEADY_RHYTHM
description: Spacing and arrangement create steady visual and logical rhythm.

name: DEGRADE_GRACEFULLY
description: Works offline. Works without API. Works with failures. Never fully broken.

name: EXPECT_FAILURE
description: Every operation considers: what if this fails? Plan the unhappy path.

name: APPEND_ONLY
description: History is never mutated. Append-only enables replay, prevents data loss.

name: JUST_ENOUGH
description: Not too much, not too little. Right-sized responses, complexity, intervention.

name: LEAST_POWER
description: Choose the weakest tool that works. Use :cheap before :strong. Use grep before LLM.

name: VISIBLE_REPAIRS
description: Fixes are features. Document repairs visibly. Addressed debt is beautiful.

name: ANTICIPATE_NEEDS
description: Predict what the user needs next. Suggest before asked. Prepare before requested.

name: DONT_FORCE
description: Don't force solutions. The right solution flows naturally.

name: SELF_APPLY
description: A system that asserts quality must achieve its own standards. MASTER passes through MASTER.

name: SHOW_COST_FIRST
description: Show what operations cost before execution. No surprise spend or side effects.

name: DEPTH_ON_DEMAND
description: Simple by default. Essential first. Complexity only when requested.

name: USER_FRIENDLY
description: Visibility. User control. Error prevention. Consistency. Recognition over recall.
